text: Ani amhi ratra ani divasala (apalya samarthyaci) nisani banavile ahe. Ratricya nisanila amhi prakasahina (nisteja) kele ani divasacya nisanila prakasamana dakhavinari banavile ahe. Yasathi ki tumhi apalya palanakartyacya krpeca sodha ghe'u sakave. Ani yasathihi ki varsaci ganana ani hisoba janu sakave. Ani pratyeka visayace amhi savistara nivedana kele ahe
